title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
In this Best of The Herd, NBA writer Mark Medina sits down with Colin to discuss Steph Curry's potency with the Warriors, Luka's future development, Warriors-Celtics as an unbeatable NBA Finals matchup, and more! Plus, whether it was before Kevin Durant, with Kevin Durant or after Kevin Durant--this Golden State Warriors team is a certified dynasty. On the flipside of the Western Conference Finals, what is next for Dallas' Luka Doncic in his development as a player?  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
